reviewtext: I have been running seven PCs on this, using an extra four port switch to expand it...It has been running nicely.  It has been a faithful servant for over a year....I had to futz with it a bit a while ago because of some interference problem that ended when I moved it away from the huge monitor I have.If you don't what to learn how to set up a router, then give away all your computers because you don't want to learn anything about them.  Like everything worth while, it takes a bit of work on your part to be successful.
summary: I am running 7 PCs on it, with no problems.
